snippet.title: Batman: Arkham Knight – Crime Fighter Challenge Pack #6
snippet.description:
Batman: Arkham Knight – Crime Fighter Challenge Pack #6

Batman: Arkham Knight – Season Pass DLC Videos Playlist:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL7N-XnsRG9lw96wNsxCJ7IWDaGr477D2p

***************************************************

Crime Alley (0:03) - Ranked Challenge

Combat Stars:
● 03 - Score 35,000 points.
● 02 - Score 25,000 points.
● 01 - Score 10,000 points.

Total Score: 178,630

Character Skin: Batman Inc.

-

Batcave (9:03) - Ranked Challenge

Predator Stars:
● Take out an enemy after hitting them with the reverse batarang (upgrade required).
● Take out an enemy when he realizes his gun has been disrupted.
● Startle an enemy by hitting another enemy with the REC.

Time Taken: 1:02.63

Character Skin: V7.43 Batman

-

Silent Knight (11:24) - Ranked Challenge

Predator Stars:
● Perform a glide kick into a ground takedown.
● Line launcher through a window into an enemy.
● Take out enemies using 3 different weak walls primed with explosive gel.

Time Taken: 0:39.46

Character Skin: Original Arkham Batman

-

Iceberg Lounge (14:59) - Ranked Challenge

Combat Stars:
● 03 - Score 50,000 points.
● 02 - Score 30,000 points.
● 01 - Score 10,000 points.

Total Score: 1,639,535

Character Skin: V7.43 Batman

-

Wayne Manor (35:31) - Ranked Challenge

Predator Stars:
● Kick 3 enemies with the same line launcher.
● Perform an inverted takedown on a medic from a vantage point.
● Take out an enemy frozen by a freeze blast.

Time Taken: 0:59.27

Character Skin: V7.43 Batman

-

Monarch Theatre (39:01) - Ranked Challenge

Combat Stars:
● 03 - Score 40,000 points.
● 02 - Score 20,000 points.
● 01 - Score 10,000 points.

Total Score: 190,955

Character Skin: 2008 Movie Batman

-

Endless Knight (46:11) - Ranked Challenge

Predator Stars:
● 03 - Take out 20 militia.
● 02 - Take out 12 militia.
● 01 - Take out 6 militia.

Downed Militia: 50

Character Skin: V8.03 Batman

***************************************************

Game available on: PlayStation 4, Xbox One & PC
Video recorded on: Playstation 4

PSN: TheArkhamChannel

***************************************************

This is a channel mainly focused on providing the Arkham fans with all the latest news, official trailers, and gameplay videos about the Arkham games. The channel is not affiliated with Rocksteady Studios or WB Games.

Subscribe here:
http://goo.gl/vx4waB
